enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Only students in the MSJ program may enroll in these classes
title: JOUR JOUR 480-0-21 Special Topics

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This class will introduce students to the basics of animation and effects using JavaScript. - manipulating HTML elements on the page, we focus on movement and timing, and then combining effects to build custom animations that users can interact with by using the mouse or gestures. Students will use these skills to storyboard and then build interactive stories to publish online using JavaScript. Prerequisite: Interactive Storytelling with JavaScript.

subject: JOUR
